00040 namespace control_toolbox {

00042 Pid::Pid(double p, double i, double d, double i_max, double i_min) :
00043   p_gain_(p), i_gain_(i), d_gain_(d), i_max_(i_max), i_min_(i_min)
00044 {
00045   this->reset();
00046 }
00047 
00048 Pid::~Pid()
00049 {
00050 }
00051 
00052 void Pid::initPid(double p, double i, double d, double i_max, double i_min)
00053 {
00054   this->setGains(p,i,d,i_max,i_min);
00055   reset();
00056 }
00057 
00058 void Pid::reset()
00059 {
00060   p_error_last_ = 0.0;
00061   p_error_ = 0.0;
00062   d_error_ = 0.0;
00063   i_term_  = 0.0;
00064   cmd_ = 0.0;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void Pid::getGains(double &p, double &i, double &d, double &i_max, double &i_min)
00068 {
00069   p = p_gain_;
00070   i = i_gain_;
00071   d = d_gain_;
00072   i_max = i_max_;
00073   i_min = i_min_;
00074 }
00075 
00076 void Pid::setGains(double p, double i, double d, double i_max, double i_min)
00077 {
00078   p_gain_ = p;
00079   i_gain_ = i;
00080   d_gain_ = d;
00081   i_max_ = i_max;
00082   i_min_ = i_min;
00083 }

00085 bool Pid::initParam(const std::string& prefix)
00086 {
00087   ros::NodeHandle nh(prefix);
00088   return this->init(nh);
00089 }
00090 
00091 bool Pid::initXml(TiXmlElement *config)
00092 {
00093   p_gain_ = config->Attribute("p") ? atof(config->Attribute("p")) : 0.0;
00094   i_gain_ = config->Attribute("i") ? atof(config->Attribute("i")) : 0.0;
00095   d_gain_ = config->Attribute("d") ? atof(config->Attribute("d")) : 0.0;
00096   double i_clamp;
00097   i_clamp = config->Attribute("iClamp") ? atof(config->Attribute("iClamp")) : 0.0;
00098   i_max_ = std::abs(i_clamp);
00099   i_min_ = -std::abs(i_clamp);
00100 
00101   reset();
00102   return true;
00103 }
00104 
00105 bool Pid::init(const ros::NodeHandle &node)
00106 {
00107   ros::NodeHandle n(node);
00108   if (!n.getParam("p", p_gain_)) {
00109     ROS_ERROR("No p gain specified for pid.  Namespace: %s", n.getNamespace().c_str());
00110     return false;
00111   }
00112   n.param("i", i_gain_, 0.0);
00113   n.param("d", d_gain_, 0.0);
00114 
00115   double i_clamp;
00116   n.param("i_clamp", i_clamp, 0.0);
00117   i_max_ = std::abs(i_clamp);
00118   i_min_ = -std::abs(i_clamp);
00119 
00120   reset();
00121   return true;
00122 }
00123 
00124 double Pid::computeCommand(double error, ros::Duration dt)
00125 {
00126   double p_term, d_term;
00127   p_error_ = error; //this is pError = pState-pTarget
00128 
00129   if (dt == ros::Duration(0.0) || std::isnan(error) || std::isinf(error))
00130     return 0.0;
00131 
00132   // Calculate proportional contribution to command
00133   p_term = p_gain_ * p_error_;
00134 
00135   //Calculate integral contribution to command
00136   i_term_ = i_term_ + i_gain_ * dt.toSec() * p_error_;
00137 
00138   // Limit i_term_ so that the limit is meaningful in the output
00139   i_term_ = std::max( i_min_, std::min( i_term_, i_max_) );
00140 
00141   // Calculate the derivative error
00142   if (dt.toSec() > 0.0)
00143   {
00144     d_error_ = (p_error_ - p_error_last_) / dt.toSec();
00145     p_error_last_ = p_error_;
00146   }
00147   // Calculate derivative contribution to command
00148   d_term = d_gain_ * d_error_;
00149   cmd_ = p_term + i_term_ + d_term;
00150 
00151   return cmd_;
00152 }
00153 
00154 double Pid::updatePid(double error, ros::Duration dt)
00155 {
00156   double p_term, d_term;
00157   p_error_ = error; //this is pError = pState-pTarget
00158 
00159   if (dt == ros::Duration(0.0) || std::isnan(error) || std::isinf(error))
00160     return 0.0;
00161 
00162   // Calculate proportional contribution to command
00163   p_term = p_gain_ * p_error_;
00164 
00165   //Calculate integral contribution to command
00166   i_term_ = i_term_ + i_gain_ * dt.toSec() * p_error_;
00167 
00168   // Limit i_term_ so that the limit is meaningful in the output
00169   i_term_ = std::max( i_min_, std::min( i_term_, i_max_) );
00170 
00171   // Calculate the derivative error
00172   if (dt.toSec() > 0.0)
00173   {
00174     d_error_ = (p_error_ - p_error_last_) / dt.toSec();
00175     p_error_last_ = p_error_;
00176   }
00177   // Calculate derivative contribution to command
00178   d_term = d_gain_ * d_error_;
00179   cmd_ = - p_term - i_term_ - d_term;
00180 
00181   return cmd_;
00182 }
00183 
00184 double Pid::computeCommand(double error, double error_dot, ros::Duration dt)
00185 {
00186   double p_term, d_term;
00187   p_error_ = error; //this is pError = pState-pTarget
00188   d_error_ = error_dot;
00189 
00190   if (dt == ros::Duration(0.0) || std::isnan(error) || std::isinf(error) || std::isnan(error_dot) || std::isinf(error_dot))
00191     return 0.0;
00192 
00193 
00194   // Calculate proportional contribution to command
00195   p_term = p_gain_ * p_error_;
00196 
00197   //Calculate integral contribution to command
00198   i_term_ = i_term_ + i_gain_ * dt.toSec() * p_error_;
00199 
00200   // Limit i_term_ so that the limit is meaningful in the output
00201   i_term_ = std::max( i_min_, std::min( i_term_, i_max_) );
00202 
00203   // Calculate derivative contribution to command
00204   d_term = d_gain_ * d_error_;
00205   cmd_ = p_term + i_term_ + d_term;
00206 
00207   return cmd_;
00208 }
00209 
00210 double Pid::updatePid(double error, double error_dot, ros::Duration dt)
00211 {
00212   double p_term, d_term;
00213   p_error_ = error; //this is pError = pState-pTarget
00214   d_error_ = error_dot;
00215 
00216   if (dt == ros::Duration(0.0) || std::isnan(error) || std::isinf(error) || std::isnan(error_dot) || std::isinf(error_dot))
00217     return 0.0;
00218 
00219 
00220   // Calculate proportional contribution to command
00221   p_term = p_gain_ * p_error_;
00222 
00223   //Calculate integral contribution to command
00224   i_term_ = i_term_ + i_gain_ * dt.toSec() * p_error_;
00225 
00226   // Limit i_term_ so that the limit is meaningful in the output
00227   i_term_ = std::max( i_min_, std::min( i_term_, i_max_) );
00228 
00229   // Calculate derivative contribution to command
00230   d_term = d_gain_ * d_error_;
00231   cmd_ = - p_term - i_term_ - d_term;
00232 
00233   return cmd_;
00234 }

00237 
00238 void Pid::setCurrentCmd(double cmd)
00239 {
00240   cmd_ = cmd;
00241 }
00242 
00243 double Pid::getCurrentCmd()
00244 {
00245   return cmd_;
00246 }
00247 
00248 void Pid::getCurrentPIDErrors(double *pe, double *ie, double *de)
00249 {
00250   *pe = p_error_;
00251   *ie = i_gain_ ? i_term_/i_gain_ : 0.0;
00252   *de = d_error_;
00253 }
